attributes.action: Deny entry to the U.K. of people who  joined ISIS.
attributes.additional_details: These people pose a grave security threat to the people of the U.K. They made the choice of leaving their country to fight for the ISIS Caliphate. Them coming back will add an additional burden to the security and expense to the U.K.
attributes.background: Please discuss this matter, so as to start the motion to set this in law to stop terrorists from re-entering the country.

rejection.details:
The Government cannot deny a UK citizen with a passport entry into the country. 

However they do have the power to revoke that person's citizenship if it is deemed to be in the public interest and would not make them state-less, subject to due process.
